nodes.text: The Graveyard of the Dragons was the putative planet where all Duinuogwuin traveled to die. The Graveyard of the Dragons of Xuaquarres was believed to be The Graveyard of the Dragons.

Jason Fry, co-author of The Essential Atlas, indicated during discussions that the Graveyard of the Dragons was excluded from The Essential Atlas Online Companion because it is not the name of a real place.
